snippet.title: 4Towers: Onslaught Trailer
snippet.description:
Follow us on facebook for super awesome reasons!
www.facebook.com/lambdamugames
LIKE us and you could win a free copy of this game!

A NEW EPISODIC COMBO-DEFENSE GAME from the people who brought you INFINIGHT!

FEATURES:

SIMPLE GAMEPLAY: Start with 4 basic tower types and upgrade them to boost their stats!

NOVEL MECHANICS: Discover new COMBOS by placing together. Resell and relocate for complete tactical control!

FEAR THE SWARM: Defend against hordes of creeps as they flood your screen en masse!

CHALLENGES GALORE: Kill tough bosses, pump your DPS and max out your multiplier to unlock awesome achievements

FORM YOUR INSIGNIA and emblazon your towers with the powers that best suit your style. The intricately balanced level design is not for the faint of heart!

join us for more on
www.facebook.com/lambdamugames
like our page and you could win a free copy of this game!
